channel.title: Stat colors help!
channel.description:
need help changin stat colors i did what exe tut said to do and nothing worked at all only the hp went green/white all the rest stayed white/yellow anyone help me do it ??
pimpscape source btw

item.title: Stat colors help!
item.dc:creator: @smokin_acez smokin_acez
item.description:
@smokin_acez wrote:

yeh i done it all proply but its only the hp stat thats workin white/blue im using @whi@ @blu@ look ill send u part of code

public void setSkillLevel(int skillNum, int currentLevel, int XP) { if(skillNum == 0) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[0]+"@whi@", 4004); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"@blu@", 4005); } if(skillNum == 2) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[2]+"@whi@", 4006); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])+"@blu@", 4007); } if(skillNum == 1) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[1]+"@whi@", 4008); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])+"@blu@", 4009); } if(skillNum == 4) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[4]+"@whi@", 4010); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])+"@blu@", 4011); } if(skillNum == 5) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[5]+"@whi@", 4012); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"@blu@", 4013); } if(skillNum == 6) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[6]+"@whi@", 4014); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])+"@blu@", 4015); } if(skillNum == 3) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[3]+"@whi@", 4016); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])+"@blu@", 4017); } if(skillNum == 16) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[16]+"@whi@", 4018); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[16])+"@blu@", 4019); } if(skillNum == 15) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[15]+"@whi@", 4020); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[15])+"@blu@", 4021); } if(skillNum == 17) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[17]+"@whi@", 4022); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[17])+"@blu@", 4023); } if(skillNum == 12) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[12]+"@whi@", 4024); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])+"@blu@", 4025); } if(skillNum == 9) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[9]+"@whi@", 4026); sendQuest(""+getLevelForXP(playerXP[9])+"", 4027); } if(skillNum == 14) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[14]+"@whi@", 4028); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])+"@blu@", 4029); } if(skillNum == 13) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[13]+"@whi@", 4030); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[13])+"@blu@", 4031); } if(skillNum == 10) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[10]+"@whi@", 4032); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[10])+"@blu@", 4033); } if(skillNum == 7) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[7]+"@whi@", 4034); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[7])+"@blu@", 4035); } if(skillNum == 11) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[11]+"@whi@", 4036); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[11])+"@blu@", 4037); } if(skillNum == 8) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[8]+"@whi@", 4038); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[8])+"@blu@", 4039); } if(skillNum == 20) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[20]+"@whi@", 4152); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[20])+"@blu@", 4153); } if(skillNum == 18) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[18]+"@whi@", 12166); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])+"@blu@", 12167); } if(skillNum == 19) { sendQuest("@whi@"+playerLevel[19]+"@whi@", 13926); sendQuest("@blu@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[19])+"@blu@", 13927); } else { outStream.createFrame(134); outStream.writeByte(skillNum); outStream.writeDWord_v1(XP); outStream.writeByte(currentLevel); } }

Read full topic
